Parallels.ab: daδuuā̊ŋhəm ahurəm mazdąm yazamaide = Y6.1, Y16.4, Y16.6, VrS81.1.
miϑrəm vouru.gaōiiaōitīm yazamaide = VrS17.16, VrS18.2, VrS28.3, VrS77.16.
sraōšəm aṣ̌īm yazamaide = Y57 (passim), VrS11.36, VrS18.1 (x3), VrS28.2, VrS42.11, VrS65.11, VrS75.11, VrS89.22.

aṣ̌āunąm vaŋᵛhīš sūrā̊ spəṇtā̊ frauuaṣ̌aiiō yazamaide = Y6.5, Y6.20, Y17.5, Y26.2, Y59.5, Y59.21, Y71.3, VrS11.33; ~ Y26.9, Y59.28 vīspā̊ aṣ̌āunąm vaŋᵛhīš sūrā̊ spəṇtā̊ frauuaṣ̌aiiō yazamaide; ~ Y71.5 vīspā̊sca aṣ̌āunąm vaŋᵛhīš sūrā̊ spəṇtā̊ frauuaṣ̌aiiō yazamaide.
